thread.title: TV | The Informant!

author: Brian Lloyd
title: TV | The Informant!
text: Steven 'Ocean's Eleven' Soderbergh directs a pudgy Matt Damon in this caper-comedy that's depressingly based on a true story. Damon plays a middle-aged chemical executive who blows the lid on price-fixing in his industry whilst working on his own schemes on the inside. Frequently funny and disturbing, The Informant! is one of Soderbergh's overlooked masterpieces.
